This place was 10/10 when meeting expectations. waking up to peacocks in our porch was so peaceful. they also had so many amenities to use. the porch is beautiful, had many times that ny partner and I would sit and have tea/ coffee. We have stayed in a lot of AirBNBs over the years, in a variety of settings. But this one stands out as particularly restful, beautiful, and unusual. It was also a great home base for our daily birding trips to the many state parks, national wildlife refuges, and private properties. Our place had a kitchenette, washer/dryer for laundry, dishwasher - all in a very efficient and modernly decorated space. We would definitely stay again. Highly recommend!
